title: Heston's grilled steak and parsley sauce

ingredients.item: 200g pack Heston from Waitrose Finishing Jus for Beef

instructions.step: Place the finishing jus in a pan over medium-high heat and reduce by half. Once reduced, add the Dijon mustard and cider vinegar. Keep warm. In the meantime, to cook the steaks, season with salt and place them on a hot barbecue or pan, flip the steaks every 15â€“20 seconds for 2 to 3 minutes, depending on the doneness of the steak. Remove from the barbecue or pan and place on a cooling rack over a tray. Allow to stand for 5 minutes.
While the steak is resting, finish the sauce by adding the chopped herbs and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
When ready to serve, season the steak with a little more salt and freshly ground black pepper and serve with the parsley sauce spooned on top, with the warm potato salad and a green side salad.
